intent_atoms.description: Implement VR-003 metadata comparison rule so CLI and validation pipelines emit catalog-driven warnings.
VR-003 metadata comparison rule is implemented and causes CLI and validation pipelines to emit catalog-driven warnings.

functional_units.name: VR-003 Metadata Comparison Rule
functional_units.description: Implements a rule that compares metadata against catalog definitions and emits warnings during CLI operations and validation pipelines

functional_units.name: VR-006 Research Logging Integration
functional_units.description: Executes research logging for VR-006 alongside CLI and UI metadata consumption once implementation tasks begin
